attributes.action: Ban Russia from SWIFT and other international banking transaction systems now.
attributes.additional_details: As an immediate and hard-hitting sanction to send a clear message to Putin and his cronies. There must be severe punishment and real teeth to any sanctions now to prevent future aggression, especially if we are to avoid armed conflict in the future. It is also a clear sign of solidarity with the Ukrainian people.
attributes.background: The UK must use its full diplomatic weight to pressure for this sanction against Russia with our partners, allies and fellow democratic states, including the EU and other international partners.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced further economic sanctions targeted at the Central Bank of the Russian Federation, and has said it is working with allies to exclude Russian banks from the SWIFT financial system: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-statement-on-further-economic-sanctions-targeted-at-the-central-bank-of-the-russian-federation
